title: Ascending Intervals - Ear Training
description: Train your ear to recognize ascending melodic intervals. Ten concise lessons progressing from unison and seconds through compound intervals.

lessons.title: Unison and Minor Second
lessons.notes: Hear identical pitches (unison) then contrast against the tension of a minor second. Practice singing both.

lessons.title: Major Second
lessons.notes: Associate with common melodies. Drill in multiple keys with a drone.

lessons.title: Minor Third
lessons.notes: Contrast m3 vs M3. Sing arpeggios to internalize.

lessons.title: Major Third
lessons.notes: Bright quality. Anchor to tonic-triad sound.

lessons.title: Perfect Fourth
lessons.notes: Stable but open; relate to IV scale degree.

lessons.title: Major Sixth
lessons.notes: Wide, warm; connect to the relative major/minor relationship.

lessons.title: Sevenths Review
lessons.notes: Differentiate m7 vs M7; cadence expectations and voice-leading.
